items.title: Why LootMogul Marketplace?
items.description: LootMogul is a web3 sports platform connecting athletes and fans through unique digital assets. Our digital collectibles have real-life utilities, allowing brands to engage in buying, selling, trading, and promoting sports-specific products within our community.

items.title: LootMogul Marketplace- Benefits
items.description: Our marketplace offer diverse revenue opportunity enabling users to monetize through transparent transactions. Sell collectibles at display museums, access to stadium games, won digital tokens, promote businesses, buy and trade limited-edition merchandise.

items.title: Create, Sell, Collect & Share
items.description: Curate, collect & trade from our exclusive range of digital collectibles. We are chain agnostic and our collections are minted on multiple blockchains. LootMogul offers secure payment in crypto as well as fiat making it convenient for all users to transact.

items.title: Wide Range of Collection
items.description: Select from a wide range of Sporticon, Platina, Meta Avatars, Trading Cards, and others from our unique set of digital collectibles. If you are a sports enthusiast, this section is for you. All our collectibles come with In Real Life rewards or In Game Play utilities.
